reviewText: Awesome, the best way to get fit.

Excellent product.  Great value.  Very helpful & interesting.  A great 'watch'!!  Necessary information for everyone re: Quality of life.  All about healthy eating and how certain foods impact one's health.

Thenk you so very much for standing behind your store. I never received this item and you gave me a full refund, promptly with no questions asked. I really would have rather received it and suspect it is somewhere in US Post Office Cyberspace. *I rate this seller highly for their integrity.*
This is a great video to watch. My hubby is not at all a person who enjoys such things and even he said he got a lot out of it. You can learn a lot from Bailey.

I found this video set in my library after reading one of Bailey's books. These videos are a little old but the same basic principles that he has been teaching in his books and videos back then are basically still the same today.

I love the book and video series that Bailey has and the knowledge that I have gained from them. If you have tried all of todays crash diets or if you just can't seem to loose weight with what your doing, I know that this set will be a huge eye opener for you.

Im buying this set, because I have the one from sacramento he did years ago. I go back to his tape over and over again. He is a funny guy, and it is just fun to watch him.
I don't care if I don't even see this set, because I know he will be motivating! I gave it 3 stars because I havn't seen it yet, but will review it after it comes.

This series provides an excellent tell it like it is approach to loosing weight. It removes all the hype that other fitness trainers and diet fads take and provides the facts on how metabolism works and what it takes to actually get fit through a combination of diet and exercise.
